title: Hour 2 - Chris Mannix (07-03-20)
itunes:title: Hour 2 - Chris Mannix (07-03-20)
description:
It's a very special 4th of July Eve edition of the Dan Patrick Show! FOX Sports Radio hosts Rob Parker and Jason Smith are in for Dan and the Danettes, and the guys argue if Antonio Brown really deserves yet another chance to play in the NFL and debate if Cam Newton will have a better season in New England than Tom Brady will have in Tampa Bay. Plus, Sports Illustrated senior writer and FS1 NBA analyst Chris Mannix stops by to discuss the players' trepidation entering the Orlando Bubble and explain why he expects a lower-seeded team to make a deep run in this unusual playoff format.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
